sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the End Youth Solitary Confinement Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the End Youth Solitary Confinement Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The purpose of this Act is to end the use of solitary confinement for young detainees in detention centers for any purpose other than preventing immediate physical harm
